devdoc.author: Joseph Reed
devdoc.details: The DelegatedWalletFactory makes it easy to deploy delegated wallet. It provides several      helper functions to deploy a wallet in several ways

params.delegates: The owner of the delegated wallet
params.owner: The owner of the delegated wallet

createWallet(address,address[]).notice: Creates a delegated wallet with the owner set to 'owner' and predefined 'delegates'
